rukus.text: yaayyuha alladhina amanu idha laqitum fi-atan fa-uth'butu wa-udh'kuru l-laha kathiran laʿallakum tuf'lihuna
wa-atiʿu l-laha warasulahu wala tanazaʿu fatafshalu watadhhaba rihukum wa-is'biru inna l-laha maʿa l-sabirina
wala takunu ka-alladhina kharaju min diyarihim bataran wariaa l-nasi wayasudduna ʿan sabili l-lahi wal-lahu bima yaʿmaluna muhitun

wa-idh zayyana lahumu l-shaytanu aʿmalahum waqala la ghaliba lakumu l-yawma mina l-nasi wa-inni jarun lakum falamma taraati l-fi-atani nakasa ʿala ʿaqibayhi waqala inni barion minkum inni ara ma la tarawna inni akhafu l-laha wal-lahu shadidu l-ʿiqabi
